title: Front-End
content: I can implement visual elements that users needs to see and interact within your web application for mobile and desktop. Using the top technologies and best practices to create components that enhance your user's website experience.

title: Back-End
content: I can create server-side application, logic and integration for your applications and formulate processes to solve problems, focused on efficiency and process improvement, including stability, speed, security and reusable code for your libraries.
